about_the_game:
This coming-of-age story follows Coni, a mechanical engineer, who creates robots called Mechas to help humanity alongside her companion B1U3 – a Mecha she created in her own image. One day, she gets a sudden warning that all Mechas have started to malfunction and scattered around in the testing grounds of the lab. Coni sets out to find out what happened, fix the malfunctioning Mechas, and bring them back safely.

Find and fix quirky robots while solving environmental puzzles

As you explore the lab testing grounds, each course provides a new challenge for Coni. You’ll have to solve puzzles, avoid traps, defeat bosses, and diagnose issues with Mechas on her journey.

Persevere through each challenge and learn to accept your “flaws”

Collaborate, accept, and trust in yourself to overcome challenges – accepting yourself leads to a greater purpose within in Mecha.

Fun for the whole family

This cozy wholesome adventure is designed with accessibility and playability in mind. This journey of learning to accept oneself is safe to share with players of all ages and abilities.

short_description: Mecha is a 3D puzzle platformer that follows Coni’s journey to find and fix her errant creations. Along the way, she learns the importance of accepting the challenges she faces and finding greater purpose.
